title: Inception
description: Inception follows Dom Cobb, a thief who enters dreams to steal secrets. Tasked with planting an idea instead, he faces subconscious dangers, blurred reality, and a race against time.

title: The Dark Knight
description: The Dark Knight sees Batman battling the Joker, a chaotic villain testing Gotham’s morality. As the city spirals into anarchy, Bruce Wayne struggles with sacrifice, justice, and the rise of Two-Face.

title: Interstellar
description: Interstellar follows astronauts on a mission through a wormhole to find a new habitable planet. As time dilates and Earth’s survival dwindles, Cooper faces love, sacrifice, and the mysteries of space.
